short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to quickly lookup information about how your local representatives voted on bills.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaRep helps you quickly see how your government representatives are voting on different issues.

This plugin makes it even easier to get information on your representatives. It adds an option to search for the selected text on Instarep to your right-click context menu, just like the built-in "search Google" option.
